backend/main.mo: Implements user profile storage with authorization checks and handles public contact inquiry submission plus admin-only inquiry retrieval and sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Declares a feature evidence report describing slug-validation changes and the related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including layouts, components, hooks, and marketing sections.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component switching between marketing and admin views and validating the deployment slug at runtime.
frontend/src/components/Admin/AdminInqui: Admin dashboard for listing, viewing, and inspecting contact inquiries with a detail dialog and back-navigation control.
frontend/src/components/Admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by enforcing authentication and admin role before rendering child components.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Controls Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting firstâ€‘time authenticated users to enter and save their name for profile setup.
frontend/src/components/Contact/ContactF: A controlled contact form that submits inquiries via a custom hook and shows a success or error state.
frontend/src/components/Layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding, current year, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content area, supporting marketing/admin view switching.
frontend/src/components/MarketingSite/Ma: Composes all marketing sections and conditionally shows a profile setup dialog based on user identity.
frontend/src/components/MarketingSite/se: Presents company background, mission, expertise, and approach using branding data.
Displays a grid of government-focused capabilities with icons and bullet lists.
Shows the contact form alongside company contact details and guidance on what information to include.
Hero section highlighting secure infrastructure services with CTAs that scroll to page sections.
Lists core service offerings for government IT infrastructure with icon-based cards.
frontend/src/components/Navigation/SiteH: Header component with navigation, mobile menu, branding, and admin toggle based on user role.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized branding settings including company name, tagline, domain, contact info, and deployment slug.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching all contact inquiries or a single inquiry through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and roles using the backend actor via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactInqui: Mutation hook to submit a contact inquiry using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/slug.ts: Utilities for generating and validating domain-safe slugs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known deployment issues, and feature definitions for a marketing website build.
